lines.text:
[Looking the other way]
He don't look mad to me.
You know me and my eyes. Some days I see right and sometimes I can't see, at all.
What do you want? We're busy.
I'm here to see the owner.
He'll be back in an hour.
An hour? Well, I wanted to see him about a plumbing job.
Oh, we got that job, already. Now, go away. We're busy.
[Accidentally hits the judge in the neck with a pipe]

[Before the ceiling explodes with water]
Well, girls, it's a royal flush!
